thread.title: Everything You Could Possibly Want to Know About the 2017 Academy Awards and Nominees
thread.title_full: Everything You Could Possibly Want to Know About the 2017 Academy Awards and Nominees

author: Jon Fusco
title: Everything You Could Possibly Want to Know About the 2017 Academy Awards and Nominees
text:
OSCARS 2017 Everything You Could Possibly Want to Know About the 2017 Academy Awards and Nominees Feeling unprepared for Sunday night? Check out all of our Oscar-related coverage from the past year. 
The date has finally arrived. We've been talking about this weekend's 89th Academy Awards for months now. So, for those of you who may have missed out, we decided to go ahead and make a comprehensive list of all of our Oscar-related coverage below. 
From exclusive, in-depth interviews with the likes of Arrival DP Bradford Young , Lion DP Greig Fraser and Toni Erdmann director Maren Ade , to supercut videos composed of all the year's stunning nominees, to free screenplay downloads for nine of the year's ten best pictures, we have a whole bunch of info here to help prepare you for your Oscars pool. 
"Moonlight" Credit: A24
